amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds in the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy (ARPA-E) account by $329 million and to reduce funds in the Weapons Activites account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy account by $329,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activites account by $329,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 266 (Roll no. 329).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 155 - 266 (Roll no. 329).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
